raw.name: sessions/1801790735498836559
raw.title: [UI] Install core deps & scripts — package.json
raw.prompt:
Mission: Install core deps & scripts
Primary target: frontend/package.json

Constraints:
- Apply changes primarily to frontend/package.json.
- Keep scope minimal to complete the mission.
- Maintain TypeScript strictness and fix any lint errors introduced.
- Add or update tests when relevant.

Instructions:
Add devDependencies: vitest, jsdom, @testing-library/react, @testing-library/jest-dom, @testing-library/user-event, @playwright/test. Add dependencies: react-router-dom, @tanstack/react-query, @tanstack/react-query-devtools (optional), @radix-ui/react-dialog, @radix-ui/react-select, @radix-ui/react-tabs, @radix-ui/react-tooltip, @radix-ui/react-switch, @radix-ui/react-checkbox, @radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu, @radix-ui/react-scroll-area, @radix-ui/react-separator, @radix-ui/react-avatar, framer-motion, react-virtuoso, zod, react-hook-form, @hookform/resolvers, recharts, clsx, tailwind-merge, lucide-react. Add scripts: test (vitest run), test:watch (vitest), test:e2e (playwright test).

raw.name: sessions/6253688328737388481
raw.title: [UI] Configure Vitest — vite.config.ts
raw.prompt:
Mission: Configure Vitest
Primary target: frontend/vite.config.ts

Constraints:
- Apply changes primarily to frontend/vite.config.ts.
- Keep scope minimal to complete the mission.
- Maintain TypeScript strictness and fix any lint errors introduced.
- Add or update tests when relevant.

Instructions:
Configure Vite+Vitest for React+TS: test.environment='jsdom', globals=true, setupFiles=['./vitest.setup.ts']. Ensure alias '@' -> './src' works in both dev and tests.

Instructions:

pullRequest.title: Harden API Client
pullRequest.description:
This submission hardens the frontend API client by introducing a centralized `request<T>` wrapper. This wrapper ensures consistent authentication, robust error handling with a typed `ApiError`, and prevents the logging of sensitive data. All relevant API methods have been updated to use this new wrapper, and the test suite has been expanded to cover all new functionality.

---
*PR created automatically by Jules for task [507490013092104559](https://jules.google.com/task/507490013092104559) started by @g2gonee2025-cloud*

pullRequest.title: Implement Global API Error Toasts
pullRequest.description:
This change introduces a global API error handling system for the frontend. It refactors the core API client to dispatch a custom `api:error` event on any non-401 error. The `ToastProvider` listens for this event and automatically displays a user-friendly error toast, improving the user experience and making debugging easier.

---
*PR created automatically by Jules for task [2856424530415677084](https://jules.google.com/task/2856424530415677084) started by @g2gonee2025-cloud*
